briefTitle: A Trial to Improve Quality of Life in People With Cirrhosis
officialTitle: A Trial to Improve Quality of Life in People With Cirrhosis - the Michigan Kristalose Trial
summary: This trial is being completed to evaluate whether a crystallized form of lactulose (Kristalose) will improve quality of life, sleep and cognitive function in patients with cirrhosis that have not been diagnosed with Hepatic Encephalopathy (HE), but report reduced quality of life.

primaryOutcome.measure: Short Form-8 Health Survey (SF-8) at 28 Days
